meanings.meaning: shudder at the thought of going back to work

vlive.korean: 일하러 가? You are going to work? 듣기 View video SF9 : 어머님들
학교를 일하러 가요? You're going to school to work? 듣기 View video NCT : 툥이에요💚
vlive.english: You're going to school to work?

vlive.korean: 소미야 일하러 가는 거 맞냐고~ Am I really going for work?? 듣기 View video 전소미 : 소미 돌잔치
vlive.english: Am I really going for work??

vlive.korean: 일하러 가기 싫다고 가지 마세요! "I don't want to go to work". Then, don't go! 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 다시 돌아온 홍모닝☀️
vlive.english: "I don't want to go to work". Then, don't go!

vlive.korean: 일하러 간다고? You are going to work? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 190629 🐰

examples.korean: He goes to work by bus. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 버스를 타고 일하러 간다[출근한다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He goes to work by bus. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I muttered something about needing to get back to work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 다시 일하러 가야 한다며 뭐라고 중얼거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I muttered something about needing to get back to work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She stayed at home while the children were young. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아이들이 어렸을 때에는 (일하러 나가지 않고) 계속 집에 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stayed at home while the children were young. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Monday blues. Don’t wanna go to work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 월요병인가 봐. 일하러 가기 싫어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Monday blues. Don’t wanna go to work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you don’t wake up excited about going to work, then this isn’t the job for you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아침에 일어나서 일하러 가는 것이 신나지 않다면, 너에게 맞는 일이 아닌 거야. DARAKWON
examples.english: If you don’t wake up excited about going to work, then this isn’t the job for you. Add to Wordbook
